title: Texas, Florida and New York: Three 2022 states to watch
description: Marc Caputo, national political reporter for Politico, Leah Askarinam, editor of the Hotline, and Ben Kamisar, staff writer with the NBC News Political Unit, join Chuck to look at the key governors' races of 2022.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: Marc Caputo, national political reporter for Politico, Leah Askarinam, editor of the Hotline, and Ben Kamisar, staff writer with the NBC News Political Unit, join Chuck to look at the key governors' races of 2022.
